text: The Internship was incredible it was my
first exposure into cloud and it was
such a safe space and a great place to
grow my career before I came to AWS I
was a college student always wanted to
work for Amazon right like I'm a tech
person of course you want to work for
Amazon but I never in a million years
believed that I could I mean in
um to such a big company being able to
invent and simplify and take ownership
of your own projects but they felt like
I was being the best version of me every
day pushing myself to be the best and
ultimately was lucky enough to get a
return offer and then I came back and
I've kind of worked up the rights from
there what hooked me was the sheer scale
of our systems and the amount of
customers that we can impact around the
world clock the people love the culture
love the work we are doing we can
experiment how to move fast and to see
all of that grow into our customers and
see that translate for that end users is
an amazing experience it's such a
rewarding place to grow your career
other internships I had worked at it was
it was more like lukewarm as to what was
expected out of you here at Amazon it
was like this is what we expect to view
these are the metrics this is how you're
gonna get a return offer I get to work
on the coolest technology I get to work
with the coolest people and I get to
work for the coolest company so yes I
love it here you can go anywhere
